post_title: Any update on the CSGO reborn client?
post_body:
I can't remember which team's were working on a CSGO project but there were 2 to my knowledge. Dimawallhacks was doing an alpha test on stream a while back 

It even brought back the original sounds and maps from the 2012 version of CSGO.

And for the record, I'm not talking about CSGO legacy build which anyone has access too. These 2 projects are projects die hard fans of CSGO were working on to bring back the game to its original state.

Does anyone know the projects I'm talking about? I genuinely cannot remember the names of them and I Just want updates.
comments: 2012 csgo was the worst, any reason you want to play it
for real, 2012 csgo might actually be the worst version of counter strike that has ever existed, unless you go back to like the beta days of '99 or something
First of multiple changes after their absolute disaster vs Rare Atom
tbf afro was benched and nawwk was playing, though his future is also in question

they're not getting rid of a core lmao. And imagine saying -matys when hes the only one providing firepower alongside blameF

zero CS knowledge.
Yeah I’m aware, it seems like the roster overall is going to get a massive overhaul

Sometimes getting rid of the core is better. 

matys is average at best, he has been on fnatic for over a year and had plenty of time to showcase his skills. 

He also had a very bad major.

post_title: What is the "Max 7.4ms" stat and how do I fix it if it spikes from 0 to 30ms sometimes even?
comments: Frametime. The time it takes to render each frame. Limiting your framerate with your graphics card control panel, RivaTuner or in-game to a little above your frame rate or the lowest average fps you commonly see can reduce frametime spikes.

Same issue on Karrigan, Zywoo ended with 58 ADR so it's another slip-up.
Want to be charitable but the production really is legendarily sloppy.
I'm pretty sure it's how much damage they did that round.
But only blast does that, pgl hud only shows adr after death
I mean that's the number that I think is shown. It's not ADR because it's not an average, but if you want to know what it's representing, it's probably that. I noticed it in the G2 game this morning.
Weird how they’d even somehow have it show damage dealt when they’ve only ever shown adr there, masterclass production behind the scenes
